name: Pekmeya's Adventure
description:
Pekmeya's Adventure is Pixel NES styled platformer made for Make-A-Level (LEAP DAY 2020) Jam.Character is based of my sister,and she also helped me with ideas to make this game.

Some usable hint is:When You see skeleton,run to the light,that's the only way to defeat him.Collect the coins,by finding the chests,and defeat evil boss.

Hope You enjoy as much as my sister and I were,when we are making this game! ^_^
